DAINTY FOOTWORK

The Maison’s ballerinas and pumps are timeless day-to-evening shoes that will round off your look with Chloé’s hallmark femininity. Lauren needs no introduction – this iconic style with its distinctive scallops comes in multiple variations, including a pump, to complement every look and attitude. Oli’s distinctive heart-shaped heel adds a playful spin to this feminine pump, available with or without a braided leather trim. Explore our range to pick the classic or statement piece right for you.
